subtitle: You can cook these scrumptious kebabs under the grill or on the barbecue.

method.text: Thread the prepared banana, kiwi fruit, orange wedges, apple wedges, strawberry halves and plum wedges onto skewers.
Put the lemon juice, honey and cinnamon in a saucepan. Gently heat together for 1 min or until melted and well mixed.
Place kebabs on a grill pan and brush liberally with the lemon mixture.
Grill for  5 min, turning occasionally, until piping hot.
Meanwhile, in a bowl, mix together the yogurt, honey and almond essence. Spoon into a serving bowl, sprinkle over the almonds. Serve with the hot kebabs.

title: Fruity kebabs with Greek yogurt and almonds
